website_summaries.verdict: A solidly built punch bag stand constructed from 3-inch steel tubing. Adequate for a 100-pound bag or smaller.
pros: Offers a durable and stable design with bottom hooks to add weights of your choice for added stability
Can easily hang a bag of up to 100 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve been good!
customer_reviews.text: I had been anticipating the arrival of this weight bag stand, opened it up, took out the pieces and things started looking a little grim when there weren’t even instructions included. The pieces were freely moving around the 5ft box. There were some scratches, no big deal, it’s going in the garage anyway. Started putting it together and fell short of finishing when there were about 4 or 5 pieces missing...I couldn’t even put it together enough to figure out exactly what pieces were missing. HUGE disappointment!!!! Had it not been for that, I’m sure the product would’ve been great. So ultimately, it wasn’t a product default but rather a seller default.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Almaraz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I put a 5 foot bag on it I’m 6’2” and raise it up a foot and it’s still to short for me
customer_reviews.author: Avis Baise

customer_reviews.title: BEEEEEYAH!
customer_reviews.text: Came all banged up. But I don't care about the looks as much as performance. It's a little short for me and I'm 6' so watch out for that. Other than that I'm gonna try and figure out how to choke the bag up a bit and it should be perfect after that
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B.

customer_reviews.title: was not happy with the customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Would not shop with this seller again. My package was just left in the middle of my parking lot for anybody to take! Was contacted saying my package had been delivered and dropped off but it wasn't there. Reached out to the seller and they said it was basically not there problem call FedEx but No one at FedEx was any help. Hard pass on a rebuy or anything else in the future! Positive side is what I wanted and it's pretty solid but the customer service NEEDS WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Rickety Cricket
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt seem to ship well. The box came busted open. Luckily, everything was still in it. Assembly was easy but set up is VERY rickety and rattles around when you punch the bag. All the bolts fit loosely even with the provided washer. Not a good value for the money. Not sure how long it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Solid, easy to put together, and handles the 70# bag I have like a champ. Packaging sucked. Parts of the cardboard we torn or falling apart, exposing the metal to scrapes and bumps. But cosmetics aren't too concerning. The "recommended" weight on the pegs is 75# each... Yes apparently they think I have nine 25lb plates laying around doing nothing lol I think I'll make do with a couple sand bags, and a rubber mat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Conard

customer_reviews.title: It's not damaged, it's good
customer_reviews.text: I read in the reviews that it comes damaged or bent. But I think people don't realize that's the way it comes for assembly. Great product. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. One of the covers of the horizontal feet holes was missing, but that could have been due to the packaging literally falling apart on me. They say you need two people to set it up. That's bogus, just don't be an idiot. I use an 80lb bag on this stand, and you definitely need some supporting weights on the vertical pegs to keep it centered and not swaying.
customer_reviews.author: HoratioCornholer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this outside and that is where it's been all spring, that being said ,it is in great shape, no rust, no wear. Very sturdy as long as you have weights on the legs. Easy to put together alone.
customer_reviews.author: Darkendfae

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s 100 pounds punching bag.. and its sturdy, easy to assemble, and the price was reasonable, too. So far, no complications or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Vidal

customer_reviews.title: I won't say i like this item but it is a okay bag stand
customer_reviews.text: I won't say i like this item but it is a okay bag stand. I feel that there is better item out there to buy and try. The materiel is well make as those others items. The real issue in this item is lightness. I use water or foam bag which are not heavy as others but this stand move and make a lot of noise. It won't matter if you put on some heavy thing to put on the stand, it will still move and sound..
customer_reviews.author: bluenavy

customer_reviews.title: Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Adequate for 100lb or smaller bag. Lightweight, so I suggest having some weights to hold it down. Doesn't obscure too much of the approach. Ideally you would want to hang from the ceiling, but this works as a very effective alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think it was that big! Which im glad!! A beautiful statue for someone
customer_reviews.text: Great stand and with perfect height ( I’m 6’). You will need some weights to hold it or you could control the bag with your punches...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: The stand seems to be durable and able to take some punishment. However it will need some plates on the 3 sides for stability because hitting the bag will move the stand. Overall it's a solid construction and seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Neur0n

customer_reviews.title: You need more than just the stand
customer_reviews.text: You need the weight plates to use this stand, otherwise don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Djanice Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: If the straps on your bag are short it is a good product for its price
customer_reviews.text: The product came very quickly, but I feel it is a bit short hanging my heavy bag up. I am 5'4" (163 cm) and I even had to clip my heavy bag higher. I doubt it is tall enough for my 5'10" boyfriend. If the straps on your bag are short it is a good product for its price. Expect to put weights on or have a partner hold the bag, I am 142 lb fighter and can easily make the stand slide around.
customer_reviews.author: D A

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, bad condition
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing parts and with components in poor condition. Disappointed in the overall lightweight feel and low quality finish. Lots of scuffs and damage to the components that were just loose on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Shan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's decent holds the bag. Consider the weights needed to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall the stand works well. We have an 80 lb bag on it biggest issue is it is too light and requires you to add additional weight to keep it from sliding. it may work better with a heavier bag say a 100 lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Good stand for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good stand. It is a little wobbly at all of the bolt connections and I had to add a lot of weight to it so it won't fall over but I do hit pretty hard. I had to locktite the bag hanger eye bolt because that backed out once already but all and all it i a good stand for the money and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Punching bag stand!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 5 star rating because it is heavy duty and solid. It is a little tall, but not a big deal for me. I recommend this to anyone who needs a bag holder or doesn't have the ability to hang something pretty heavy from your ceiling. Just make sure you have someone else there to help hold the bag up while you adjust the chain and hang it as it is quite heavy doing it by yourself. All in all, it was easy to construct and quite stout. If your a heavy hitter, you might want some weights on the stand so it doesn't wander on you.
customer_reviews.author: cade

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. I was missing 2 pieces and the seller immediately sent them to me. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy Stand
customer_reviews.text: The bolts don't tighten enough for the stand to be sturdy. I don't get the high reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Kwak

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: works as intended. i also added some free weight to the bottom. I use a 90 lb hard bag, and are 6'3'' + 200 lbs +. I shortened the chain to make the bag taller. Could use for kicking as well if i wanted too. It does move around, even with 100 extra lbs on it, however i expect that with things that i hit hard. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: the stand is great, But it doesnt come with everything you need ...
customer_reviews.text: the stand is great , But it doesnt come with everything you need to assemble it . There wasnt even half the amount of washers in the pack that the directions call for. After a trip to the hardware store it is up . All in all good stand
customer_reviews.author: David Alan Deem II

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price I put a 70lbs bag on it and it moves a little when actively using it the assembly was relatively easy did have a cpl dinks in it from bad packaging other than that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Juan j perez

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand ! Bought it for my 100lb heavy bag! Doesn’t really move a lot, but you should still put some weights on the bottom to keep it still! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Haus

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: Great Stand for the money. Came fast and was easy set up. Kid loves it. Make sure you own some weights to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: L.V.

customer_reviews.title: ... you would expect - just as pictured - fairly easy to put together - instructions included - and do ...
customer_reviews.text: just as you would expect - just as pictured - fairly easy to put together - instructions included - and do what they say. takes up more footprint on carpet than expected but then it wasn't supposed to be 'little' . totally happy with it
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNA

customer_reviews.title: Good for its intended use but pacakaged poorly. Badly scuffed from loose packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good for its intended use. Unfortunately it was not packaged properly. It arrived a shaky mess. Several parts were heavily scuffed and one part was bent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my college son who seems to love it. I didn't realize how sturdy this item would be but if the boxer in your life is a bit too zealous about his punches there are 3 places on the bottom to put extra weights too. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Lange

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very sturdy, make sure to put weight plates on the provided spaces to keep it from tipping. Holds up very well; easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Preslee Deaner

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy and was very easy to assemble, but there were marks and scratches. The packaging was pathetic and a hole at one end of the box was covered with clear tape. The manufacturer and seller need to do a much better job packaging this product to hold up better to the "wear and tear" of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mtnMan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer's max weight and the posted max weight are different with the manufacturer's weight limit being 20 pounds less. Also missing one of the post used to place weights on to stabilize the stand. I contacted the manufacturer and they don't have parts for this model stand. Would have been nice to get the missing part. Overall the stand is good, if you get all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and very functional
customer_reviews.text: The stand arrived about a week after I ordered it (even though it was "out-of-stock"). The box was a little damaged and one of the frames were slightly bent (on another end of the box so it couldnt have been related to the box damage?). I straightened the bent support frame and put it together - took about 35 mins total time. Instructions are great. Very well constructed and very sturdy. The stand is slightly shy of 7 feet and fit perfectly in the basement workout room.I have a 50 pound bag hanging from it and it fits perfectly with very little give.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Rabbipal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble- great price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand. While the box was in rough shape- nothing was missing and the parts were fine. Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: I received all but one peg. How do I contact the seller for this? I don’t want to return it but I do want the rest of the parts considering I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and very sturdy to hold our 80lb. bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brion Renzi

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: This made my punching bag portable so I can bring it with me to school in the fall. It also allowed me to practice at home without damaging the ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Solid, holds well, but you do need the weights, not included, to keep the whole thing stable.
customer_reviews.author: Odies mom

customer_reviews.title: It's a heavy bag stand.
customer_reviews.text: It's a heavy bag stand, and it's gray. Not much more you can say about it, really. Works just like you'd expect it to. I will say, it's rather large. So make sure you have at least 7 to 7 1/2 ft ceilings and a large corner to fit it in.
customer_reviews.author: Mich S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my heavy bag. No issues at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Punching bag stand.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, make sure you use the add weight option for heavy hitters.
customer_reviews.author: Works too hard.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. You need to buy or add some weights before properly use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Stand works.
customer_reviews.text: I got it because I had purchase a heavy bag. I did not want to try and mount the bag to a rafter. Other than arriving scratched and scuffed, it does the job. The parts were not packed properly. Unless you're supper strong hitting the bag you might want to leave the weight anchors off the base. Otherwise they are good ankle busters, plus the rubber bumpers that come with it gave off noxious odors. I put mine in the recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: WJP1940

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've got 4 boys and they haven't broken it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrika

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it...Can't say anything bad because it works for me...
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: base not stable enough -- need extra weight to hold it
customer_reviews.author: Ling Meng

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Bad Packing.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, sturdy and easy to put together. However, the packing seems to have "moved" in transit and the frame has several scratches and abrasions.
customer_reviews.author: PETER E SAMPSON

customer_reviews.title: ... edge prices broken but other than that I'm very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one of the plastic edge prices broken but other than that I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tMax

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, put it together by myself in less than an hours, sturdy and holds my heavy bag no problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Clos

customer_reviews.title: Requires at least 210lbs of weights to hold it down.
customer_reviews.text: It needs at least 220lbs of weight to stabilize this thing. that's 70lbs x 3. Not something I was expecting but hope this will help others decide when purchasing. The assembly is not hard, I did it myself and it feels sturdy enough with my 100lb everlasting training bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand simple to put together. Just make sure you buy a bunch of weight plates with it. So you can weigh it down. Prevent it from moving everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Priesol

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's heavy bag that I bought used and it works great. It was easy to assemble and set up and is very sturdy. It does require weights to hold it down and keep it from bouncing around when you are hitting the bag.but we were able to use some heavy weights from the weight bench.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: overall would reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good stand. Not too difficult to assemble. It's sturdy, but you definitely have to buy weights to keep it from swinging with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: For the money, you can't do better.
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a recreational bag stand for my light home workouts, I was pretty discouraged with how much professional stands cost. So when I found this much cheaper option, I assumed it would be second-rate, but gave it a shot anyway. To my surprise, it is super solid. Once you get the stand weighted down, a 70lb+ bag works really well. I use it 3-4x per week and have for 6 months and am very satisfied with the purchase for light workout purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ryan Cox

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6'1" and my son is 6'3" very cool! Assembly is very simple also
customer_reviews.text: Works out just right and able to have it at the correct level for punching and kicks. I'm 6'1" and my son is 6'3" very cool! Assembly is very simple also.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: This Is a USED Item
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the product is good. I will need to purchase weights, but the product arrived used. It had cracked pieces and the pools at scuffs and dents. I decided to keep it, but only because it would be harder for me to return than to keep. I honestly thought I was purchasing a NEW item since it was by Amazon and every item I have ordered from Amazon LLC. in the past has been a brand new item. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: anthony fakourey

customer_reviews.title: Safety issue
customer_reviews.text: The stand is nice enough. The nut that holds the hook in place is horrible. It doesn't screw down all the way so the hook comes loose and the bag falls. The nuts for the whole thing are that way. Not really safe. I have to buy my own to keep the hook secured.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: this unit is very good, well made but the box that it was ...
customer_reviews.text: this unit is very good, well made but the box that it was sent fell apart on the truck, had to take it off in parts
customer_reviews.author: Retired Army

customer_reviews.title: I ADDED A 60LB BAG AND IT WORKED GREAT. NOT SURE IT WOULD HOLD UP FOR MY ...
customer_reviews.text: I ADDED A 60LB BAG AND IT WORKED GREAT. NOT SURE IT WOULD HOLD UP FOR MY 100LB BAG. #SanjayMadhav
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Madhav

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-needed weights
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift. Was unaware that the bag was not included. Not sure if it was misleading or I wasn't careful. This one was displayed with the bag. Other stands I viewed showed it by itself. The gift was well-received so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Stand itself was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Stand itself was easy to assemble, but did not include two weight bar stands in package. The whole thing is wobbles without extra weight supporting the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Was a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: it was a great stand, a little light but works just fine. could not have found it at a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to assemble and is most sturdy for a good workout. I have an 80 pound bad hanging thereon and the product holds the same securely and safely with no sway.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE

customer_reviews.title: did what its supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: certainly does the trick! I've got an everlast bag with it, and the build time and instructions were easy enough
customer_reviews.author: blay

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy or stable
customer_reviews.text: This is not stable at all, if you hit the bag hard enough for it to swing at all it will tip. I had to purchase weights to weigh it down before it could properly be used.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

product_meta.title: Century Heavy Bag Stand, Gray
product_meta.description: Durable steel construction with the main upright constructed of 3-inch steel tubing. Includes weight pegs for stability and mounts a heavy bag up to 100 lbs.
feature_bullets: Perfect for boxers and martial artists

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
